item.description: Primary/Backup Replication è¯¾ç¨‹åœ°å€ the note from the lecture Primary/Backup Replication for Fault Tolerance Case study of VMware FT, an extreme version of the idea fault tolerance to provide availability despite server and network failures using replication What kinds of failures can replication deal with? “fail-stop” failure of a single replica fan stops working, CPU overheats and shuts itself down someone trips over replica’s power cord or network
